title: Smart Data Models - Mapping of ACRIS data model CheckpointAreaLocation
description: Property. The geospatial or geopolitical location of a Checkpoint.

type.description: Property. It must be equal to CheckpointAreaLocation.

Latitude.description: Property. Coordinate of the latitude of the checkpoint area location.

Longitude.description: Property. Coordinate of the longitude of the checkpoint area location.

Name.description: Property. Unique name for geospatial or geopolitical location of a Checkpoint Area Location.

Srid.description: Property. A Spatial Reference System Identifier (SRID), to identify the spatial coordinate system definitions

AirportElevation.description: Property. The height of an Airport, above sea level.

Name.description: Property. The name of an Airport elevation above sea level.

Value.description: Property. The value of an Airport elevation above sea level.

AirportElevationUnitOfMeasurement.description: Property. The unit of measure of the height of an Airport above sea level (FT for foot or M for metre).

Name.description: Property. The name of the unit of measure for an Airport elevation above sea level.

ZoneAreaLocation.description: Property. The geospatial or geopolitical location of a Queuing Zone in a Terminal.

Name.description: Property. Unique name for the Zone Area Location.

TerminalAreaLocation.description: Property. The geospatial or geopolitical location of an Airport Terminal building.

Name.description: Property. Unique name for the Terminal Area Location.

AirportLocation.description: Property. The geospatial or geopolitical location of an Airport.

Latitude.description: Property. Coordinate for latitude of the Airport.

Longitude.description: Property. Coordinate for longitude of the Airport.

Name.description: Property. Unique name for the Airport Location.

Srid.description: Property. A Spatial Reference System Identifier (SRID), to identify the spatial coordinate system definitions.
